          window.getCookie = function(name) {
            var match = document.cookie.match(name + '=([^;]*)');
            return match ? match[1] : undefined;
          };
          window.setCookie = function(name, value, days, domain) {
            var d = new Date();
            d.setTime(d.getTime() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000 * days);
            document.cookie = name + "=" + value + ";domain=" + domain + ";path=/;expires=" + d.toGMTString();

class="sc-1rhfmbl-2 kfWTvz" id="scrolling-testimonials-text"><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><div class="sc-1rhfmbl-3 fbsZiv"><h1 class="sc-q5evhb-0 kLCPeb" color="#FFFFFF">Mighty Networks is different</h1></div></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><p class="sc-c0l215-0 hQsspc" color="#FFFFFF">We believe that when you put community at the center of online courses, memberships, and offers,  you create magical member experiences just not possible with a chat app or Facebook group.

                This simple, but profound shift was forged scaling pioneering social platforms like Ning, and today means we've created  software, strategy, resources, and education to get you phenomenal results faster and more easily than you can get anywhere else.</p></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><a class="sc-cm44cn-0 gPPqDm styled-link-simple" class="sc-c0l215-0 nMrBR">Curt Malcom</p><p class="sc-c0l215-0 kSATWJ"><span class="sc-1rhfmbl-7 kqVLta">Deeper Than the Brand</span></p></div></div><p class="sc-c0l215-0 gudBu">Our community gives oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><p class="sc-c0l215-0 LUbJd">Launch your Mighty Network with a free community, add a paid membership, or design your online courses with dedicated course communities, events, livestreaming, and more from Day 1. 
 
 On a Mighty Network, it's your choice of features, and everything's in one place.</p></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><a class="sc-cm44cn-0 fVHlsP styled-link-simple" href="/features"><span class="sc-cm44cn-1 ecWvfl" color="main"> <svg height="15px" overflow="visible" style="margin-left:0.7rem" viewbox="0 0 20.66 15.8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M24.6071 7.63419C24.9573 7.28393 24.9573 6.71607 24.6071 6.36581L18.8994 0.658136C18.5491 0.307884 17.9813 0.307884 17.631 0.658136C17.2808 1.00839 17.2808 1.57626 17.631 1.92651L22.7045 7L17.631 12.0735C17.2808 12.4237 17.2808 12.9916 17.631 13.3419C17.9813 13.6921 18.5491 13.6921 18.8994 13.3419L24.6071 7.63419ZM0 7.89688H23.9729V6.10312H0V7.89688Z"></path></svg></span><span>Explore the features of a Mighty Network </span></a></div></section></div></div><div class="sc-y62cwb-0 hhZoIy" id="mighty-pro-phones-track-container"><div class="sc-y62cwb-1 gIbrkY"><div class="sc-1cyg65b-0 edCgrO"><section class="sc-1cyg65b-1 feYqtu"><div class="sc-y62cwb-2 ebLHwL"><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><h1 class="sc-q5evhb-0 jhCtVx" color="#FFFFFF">When youre ready, upgrade to your own branded mobile apps &amp; website</h1></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><p class="sc-c0l215-0 hQsspc" color="#FFFFFF">Only Mighty Networks offers you the choice to upgrade your community, courses, and memberships to your own branded mobile apps and website. 

This means its YOUR brand in the Apple App Store and Google Play Store  without the time or risk of custom development, or moving to another platform later.</p></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><h1 class="sc-q5evhb-0 jOwCIe">Get free education in Mighty Community</h1></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><p class="sc-c0l215-0 cpmPPT">Beautiful software without the strategy, community, and support to use it isnt that helpful. 

Thats why weve invested heavily in Mighty Community, our own Mighty Network where youll get free resources, events, answers, and a supportive community of fellow Hosts on the same path. 

Its also a great way to see a Mighty Network in action. </p></div><div class="sc-1gtyyma-0 oOGAO fade-in-animation-wrapper"><a class="sc-cm44cn-0 iRzfnQ styled-link-simple" color="#FFFFFF">Your Big Purpose is the motivation for your community, course, or membershipand why your members will join and contribute.
